page.title: 13THE CREST HOTEL IN ERSKINE
page.content: The Crest Hotel opened in 1971. There are eight floors altogether, six of which are occupied by 200 bedrooms. There is one restaurant with 200 seats and one function room which can be divided into three. The hotel employs a staff of approximately 140. There are many facilities available to guests which include a shop, bar and an exercise room. Weddings, conferences and exhibitions are just some of the functions which take place in the hotel throughout the year. The hotel is popular with foreign guests in the summer months, but it has mainly British guests in the winter. It is very well situated, near the Erskine Bridge, overlooking the River Clyde. It is a very good starting point for visitors arriving at Glasgow Airport and making their way up to the north of Scotland.
